spec_data.Name: python-pp
spec_data.Description:
pp is a python module which provides mechanism for parallel execution of
python code on SMP (systems with multiple processors or cores) and clusters
(computers connected via network).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 02:56:10 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Parallel execution of python on smp
